scripts.clean:run: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd.. && npx react-native run-android
scripts.release:build:mac: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.release:build:win: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rd /s /q android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rd /s /q android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.release:build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.debug:build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.reinstall:modules: rm -rf yarn.lock && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install
scripts.relink:assets: react-native bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --dev false --reset-cache --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.upload: git add . && git commit -m "new updates" && git push -u origin main
